txt.en: You have done much to purge the many kergrim from within Gorthad Nûr, the Deep-barrow.

Gorthad Nûr was once a place of solemn rest and peace, but without the maintenance of upkeep and cleaning provided by its keepers, it fell to filth and pestilence. Tombs throughout Middle-earth have long proven impossible for the vile kergrim to resist, and in Gorthad Nûr the creatures had time enough to develop their own rituals among the forgotten bones. They became the keepers of the Deep-barrow, and very few among the Free People remembered the place it once had been, before the desecration, before the rot.
Defeat many kergrim within Gorthad Nûr, the Deep-barrow.
